meanings.definition: To manage or guide the activities of a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: She is directing the school play.
meanings.sent2: The coach is directing the team's practice.
meanings.sent3: The cat is directing the mice to their hiding spots.
meanings.sent4: The sunflower is directing its petals towards the sun.
meanings.sent5: He was directing the traffic with precise hand signals.

meanings.definition: To give instructions or orders to someone.
meanings.sent1: The teacher is directing the students to open their books.
meanings.sent2: The boss is directing the employees on the new project.
meanings.sent3: The parrot is directing the other birds on how to sing a song.
meanings.sent4: The wind is directing the leaves to dance in the air.
meanings.sent5: She was directing him to follow the map to the treasure.

meanings.definition: To aim or point something in a particular direction.
meanings.sent1: He is directing the flashlight towards the dark corner.
meanings.sent2: The archer is directing the arrow towards the target.
meanings.sent3: The chef is directing the pasta into the boiling water.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse is directing ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent5: She was directing her gaze towards the distant mountains.
